course.subject: HUMA
course.name: Structure of Words
course.description: This is an introductory course to morphology, the study of word structure. This course introduces students to core concepts of morphology such as morpheme and word and major morphological processes including inflection, derivation, compounding, etc. Languages will be examined in view of morphological typology, and interaction between morphology and other linguistic components such as semantics, phonology, syntax, etc., will be studied.
